languages.text: "Но я видел иное. Знания, которые разъедали разум тех, кто пустил их в себя. И все равно я ищу их... почему? Может потому, что на самом деле на знании нет греха? Они опасны, да, но... не запретны, ибо созданы Омниссией".

"But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: "Но я видел иное. Знания, которые разъедали разум тех, кто пустил их в себя. И все равно я ищу их... почему? Может потому, что на самом деле на знании нет греха? Они опасны, да, но... не запретны, ибо созданы Омниссией".

traits.locale_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no sin in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no sin in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Perhaps because there really is no sin in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

Perhaps because there really is no sin in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “但我看到的一切却并非如此。我见过那些渴求知识之人，他们的头脑被知识蚕食。但即便如此，我却依然在寻求它……这是为什么？莫非因为知识本身真的不存在有罪与否吗？它很危险，没错，但却……并不是禁忌之物，因为它是由欧姆尼塞亚创造出来的。”
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: “但我看到的一切却并非如此。我见过那些渴求知识之人，他们的头脑被知识蚕食。但即便如此，我却依然在寻求它……这是为什么？莫非因为知识本身真的不存在有罪与否吗？它很危险，没错，但却……并不是禁忌之物，因为它是由欧姆尼塞亚创造出来的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No es eso lo que he visto. He visto cómo el conocimiento roe las mentes de quienes lo absorben. Y, a pesar de eso, lo busco... ¿Por qué? ¿Es posible que sea porque no hay apostasía en el conocimiento? Es peligroso, sí... pero no está prohibido, pues fue creado por el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: «No es eso lo que he visto. He visto cómo el conocimiento roe las mentes de quienes lo absorben. Y, a pesar de eso, lo busco... ¿Por qué? ¿Es posible que sea porque no hay pecado en el conocimiento? Es peligroso, sí... pero no está prohibido, pues fue creado por el Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、私が見てきたのはそうではない。知識は、それを内に秘めた者の心を蝕む。それでも私はそれを求める。なぜか…？知識は背教ではないからだろうか？確かに危険ではある…だが、禁じられたものではない。それは、万機神によって創られしものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、私が見てきたのはそうではない。知識は、それを内に秘めた者の心を蝕む。それでも私はそれを求める。なぜか…？知識は背教ではないからだろうか？確かに危険ではある…だが、禁じられたものではない。それは、万機神によって創られしものなのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Doch das ist nicht, was ich gesehen habe. Ich habe gesehen, wie Wissen den Verstand jener zerfrisst, die es hineingelassen haben. Und doch strebe ich danach ... Warum? Vielleicht, weil im Wissen wirklich keine Apostasie liegt? Es ist gefährlich, ja, doch ... nicht verboten, denn es wurde vom Omnissiah erschaffen."
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Doch das ist nicht, was ich gesehen habe. Ich habe gesehen, wie Wissen den Verstand jener zerfrisst, die es hineingelassen haben. Und doch strebe ich danach ... Warum? Vielleicht, weil im Wissen wirklich keine Sünde liegt? Es ist gefährlich, ja, doch ... nicht verboten, denn es wurde vom Omnissiah erschaffen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mais ce n'est pas mon expérience. J'ai vu la connaissance ronger l'esprit de ceux qui s'en étaient laissé imprégner. Malgré tout, je suis à sa poursuite... Pourquoi ? Peut-être parce que le savoir est réellement exempt de toute apostasie ? Certes, il est dangereux, mais... pas interdit, étant par essence une création de l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce n'est pas mon expérience. J'ai vu la connaissance ronger l'esprit de ceux qui s'en étaient laissé imprégner. Malgré tout, je suis à sa poursuite... Pourquoi ? Peut-être parce que le savoir est réellement exempt de tout péché ? Certes, il est dangereux, mais... pas interdit, étant par essence une création de l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

languages.text: "Gördüğüm şey bu değil ama. İrfanın, onu bünyesine alanların zihinlerini kemirip yok ettiğine şahit oldum. Yine de onun arayışındayım. Neden? İrfanda din dışılık olmadığı için mi? Evet, tehlikelidir fakat yasaklı değildir çünkü o da Hermesih tarafından yaratılmıştır."
languages.original_text: "But that is not what I have seen. I have seen knowledge gnaw away at the minds of those who let it inside them. Yet I seek it regardless... Why? Perhaps because there really is no apostasy in knowledge? It is dangerous, yes, but... not forbidden, for it was created by the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğüm şey bu değil ama. İrfanın, onu bünyesine alanların zihinlerini kemirip yok ettiğine şahit oldum. Yine de onun arayışındayım. Neden? İfranda din dışılık olmadığı için mi? Tehlikelidir, evet, ama yasaklı değildir çünkü o da Hermesih tarafından yaratılmıştır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
